name: BattleCON: Online Season 2
detailed_description:
BattleCON: Online Season 2 DLC.
Get all 12 Fighters in Season 2 of the game! A worthy addition!

Season 2 Includes - Kimbhe, Magdelina, Cesar, Marmelee, Mikhail, Anath, Sarafina, Burman, Evil Hikaru, Iri, Rexan, Kehrolyn.


* No discount or refund is given for fighters you have purchased individually in-game from this series.
about_the_game:
BattleCON: Online Season 2 DLC.
Get all 12 Fighters in Season 2 of the game! A worthy addition!

Season 2 Includes - Kimbhe, Magdelina, Cesar, Marmelee, Mikhail, Anath, Sarafina, Burman, Evil Hikaru, Iri, Rexan, Kehrolyn.


* No discount or refund is given for fighters you have purchased individually in-game from this series.
short_description: BattleCON: Online Season 2 DLC - 12 Fighter pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.0ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics (Cherry Trail)
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This will require to run the client in 30 FPS instead of 60 FPS.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.4ghz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of VRAM Dedicated GPU.
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Should run 60 FPS mode fine.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: El Capitan+
  • Processor: 2.0ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel integrated graphics.
  • Storage: 1000 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This will require to run the client in 30 FPS instead of 60 FPS.
